version.description: A version number for the output format.

status.description: Optional status. If present, overrides the statuses of the groups/tests.

group.description: A group in the test output.

name.description: Human-visible name of the group of tests.

sprite.description: Optionally link this group to a certain sprite.

visibility.description: Default visibility. If the group contains an error, it should be shown, regardless of this value.

messages.description: A list of optional messages to display in this group.

status.description: Optional status. If present, overrides the statuses of the tests.

tests.description: A list of tests in this group.

groups.description: A list of subgroups in this group.

test.description: A test in the test plan. Tests one thing.

feedback.description: A human-visible description of the test.

messages.description: A list of optional messages to display in this test.

diff.description: The expected and actual value. Can be used to display a diff.

name.description: An internal name for the test. Students should not see this, but teachers or admins might.
